trans-unit.source: An abstract base class that encapsulates functionality that is common to file dialogs, including <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog"></xref> and <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一个封装文件对话框，其中包括通用功能的抽象基类<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog"></xref>和<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a file dialog automatically adds an extension to a file name if the user omits an extension.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否用户省略扩展名，文件对话框是否自动将扩展添加到的文件名称。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if extensions are added; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果添加了扩展;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a file dialog displays a warning if the user specifies a file name that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否用户指定不存在的文件名，文件对话框是否显示警告。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog> class sets this property to `true` in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog>类将此属性设置为`true`在其构造函数。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if warnings are displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果显示警告;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default in this base class is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此基类中的默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether warnings are displayed if the user types invalid paths and file names.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否用户键入无效的路径和文件名，是否显示警告。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if warnings are displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果显示警告;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the list of custom places for file dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文件对话框自定义位置的列表。

trans-unit.source: Starting in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winvista](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winvista-md.md)], open and save file dialog boxes have a **Favorite Links** panel on the left side of the dialog box that allows the user to quickly navigate to a different location.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winvista](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winvista-md.md)]、 打开和保存文件对话框具有**收藏夹链接**允许用户能够快速导航到其他位置的对话框中左侧的面板。

trans-unit.source: These links are called custom places.
trans-unit.target: 这些链接称为自定义区域。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to modify the list that appears when your application uses a file dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此属性，可修改你的应用程序使用一个文件对话框时将显示的列表。

trans-unit.source: The list of custom places.
trans-unit.target: 自定义区域的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the default extension string to use to filter the list of files that are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定要用于筛选显示的文件列表的默认扩展名字符串。

trans-unit.source: The extension string must contain the leading period.
trans-unit.target: 扩展字符串必须包含前导句点。

trans-unit.source: For example, set the DefaultExt property to ".txt" to select all text files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，将 DefaultExt 属性设为".txt"以选择所有文本文件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.AddExtension%2A> property attempts to determine the extension to filter the displayed file list from the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.Filter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.AddExtension%2A>尝试确定要筛选显示的文件列表中的扩展属性<xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.Filter%2A>属性。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.Filter%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.AddExtension%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the extension cannot be determined from the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.Filter%2A> property, DefaultExt will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果该扩展不能确定从<xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.Filter%2A>将改为使用属性，DefaultExt。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.Filter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default extension string.
trans-unit.target: 默认扩展名字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a file dialog returns either the location of the file referenced by a shortcut or the location of the shortcut file (.lnk).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示文件对话框是否返回快捷方式引用的文件的位置或快捷方式文件 (.lnk) 的位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to return the location referenced; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to return the shortcut location.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>返回引用的位置;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>返回快捷方式位置。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string containing the full path of the file selected in a file dialog.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含文件对话框中选定的文件的完整路径的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If more than one file name is selected (length of <xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.FileNames%2A> is greater than one) then FileName contains the first selected file name.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择多个文件的名称 (长度<xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.FileNames%2A>大于一) 则 FileName 包含第一个选择的文件名。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.FileNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no file name is selected, this property contains <xref:System.String.Empty> rather than `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择没有文件名称时，此属性包含<xref:System.String.Empty>而非`null`。</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is the full path of the file selected in the file dialog.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，它是文件对话框中选定的文件的完整路径。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets an array that contains one file name for each selected file.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含每个选定文件一一对应的文件名的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.String> that contains one file name for each selected file.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.String>，其中包含每个选定文件一一对应的文件名。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is an array with a single item whose value is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是带有其值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>单个项的数组

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user selects a file name by either clicking the **Open** button of the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog"></xref> or the **Save** button of the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当用户通过单击选择某个文件名时发生**打开**按钮<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog"></xref>或**保存**按钮<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: FileOk is raised after the user selects a file name, but before the dialog closes, which allows you to process the selection.
trans-unit.target: 在用户选择一个文件名，但对话框关闭之前，该编辑器可以处理所选内容后，将引发 FileOk。

trans-unit.source: If required, the user's selection can be cancelled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> argument to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要，可以通过设置取消用户的选择<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>参数`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the filter string that determines what types of files are displayed from either the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog"></xref> or <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置确定哪些类型的文件中显示的筛选器字符串<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog"></xref>或<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the filter.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含筛选器。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>, which means that no filter is applied and all file types are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String>，这意味着在应用任何筛选器，并且所有文件类型显示。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The filter string is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器字符串无效。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the filter currently selected in a file dialog.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文件对话框中当前选定筛选器的索引。

trans-unit.source: This index is 1-based, not 0-based, due to compatibility requirements with the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此索引是从 1 开始，而不基于 0 的因为与基础的兼容性要求[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Int32> that is the index of the selected filter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>，它是所选的筛选器的索引。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: Defines the common file dialog hook procedure that is overridden to add common functionality to a file dialog.
trans-unit.target: 定义重写以向文件对话框添加通用功能的通用文件对话框挂钩过程。

trans-unit.source: Window handle for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] dialog.
trans-unit.target: 窗口句柄[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]对话框。

trans-unit.source: Message to be processed by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] dialog.
trans-unit.target: 消息处理由[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]对话框。

trans-unit.source: Parameters for dialog actions.
trans-unit.target: 用于对话框操作的参数。

trans-unit.source: Parameters for dialog actions.
trans-unit.target: 用于对话框操作的参数。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.IntPtr> to indicate success; otherwise, a non-zero value is returned to indicate failure.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.IntPtr>以指示成功; 否则，返回一个非零值以指示失败。</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial directory that is displayed by a file dialog.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文件对话框显示的初始目录。

trans-unit.source: If there is no initial directory set, this property will contain <xref:System.String> rather than a null string.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有设置初始目录，该属性将包含<xref:System.String>而不是一个 null 字符串。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the initial directory.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含初始目录。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.FileOk"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.FileOk"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: OnFileOk raises the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.FileOk> event.
trans-unit.target: OnFileOk 引发<xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.FileOk>事件。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.FileOk>

trans-unit.source: A type that derives from <xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog> may override OnFileOk.
trans-unit.target: 派生自类型<xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog>可能会重写 OnFileOk。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog>

trans-unit.source: The overridden method must call OnFileOk on the base class if <xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.FileOk> needs to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 重写的方法必须调用 OnFileOk 基本类如果<xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.FileOk>需要引发。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.FileOk>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] common file dialog flags that are used by file dialogs for initialization.
trans-unit.target: 获取[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]通用文件对话框标志，由文件初始化的对话框。

trans-unit.source: This value is used to display a file dialog with the current set of property values.
trans-unit.target: 此值用于显示文件对话框当前组的属性值。

trans-unit.source: The actual options are exposed as properties on the specific dialogs, but not documented as public flag values at this level, so the uses of this property are mainly internal, for use when implementing the derived classes <xref:Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog> and <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog>.
trans-unit.target: 实际的选项公开为特定的对话框上的属性，但未记录作为此级别的公共标志值，因此此属性的用途是主要内部，用于实现派生的类<xref:Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog>和<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog>。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog></xref:Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog>时

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> that contains the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] common file dialog flags that are used by file dialogs for initialization.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Int32>包含[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]通用文件对话框标志，由文件初始化的对话框。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Sets all properties of a file dialog back to their initial values.
trans-unit.target: 设置文件对话框的所有属性都回其初始值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未实现此属性。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未实现。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.CommonDialog.RunDialog*> is called to display a file dialog in a derived class, such as <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog"></xref> and <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.CommonDialog.RunDialog*>调用以显示文件对话框在派生类中，如<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog"></xref>和<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"> </xref>。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.CommonDialog.RunDialog*>

trans-unit.source: The dialog that is eventually shown is assigned an owner window, which is specified by the `hwndOwner` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 最终显示的对话框分配给所有者窗口中，由指定`hwndOwner`参数。

trans-unit.source: Handle to the window that owns the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 拥有对话框的窗口的句柄。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user clicks the **OK** button of the dialog that is displayed (for example, <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog"></xref>, <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"></xref>); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户单击**确定**按钮显示的对话框 (例如， <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog"> </xref>， <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"> </xref>); 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that only contains the file name for the selected file.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字符串，仅包含所选文件的文件名。

trans-unit.source: This value is the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.FileName%2A> with all path information removed.
trans-unit.target: 此值是<xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.FileName%2A>所有删除的路径信息。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.FileName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Removing the paths makes the value appropriate for use in partial trust applications, since it prevents applications from discovering information about the local file system.
trans-unit.target: 删除路径使值适用于在部分信任应用程序中使用，因为它可防止应用程序发现有关本地文件系统的信息。

trans-unit.source: If more than one file name is selected (length of <xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.SafeFileNames%2A> is greater than one) then this property contains only the first selected file name.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择多个文件的名称 (长度<xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.SafeFileNames%2A>大于一) 则此属性包含仅第一个选择的文件名。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.SafeFileNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [Safe File Upload from an XBAP Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01206dd3-acc7-45ff-aeb9-502c20aaad2c).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[安全文件上的传 XBAP 示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01206dd3-acc7-45ff-aeb9-502c20aaad2c)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that only contains the file name for the selected file.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>仅包含所选文件的文件名。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>, which is also the value when either no file is selected or a directory is selected.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String>，不选择任何文件或选择了一个目录时也为此值。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets an array that contains one safe file name for each selected file.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含每个选定文件的一个安全的文件名称的数组。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.SafeFileName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.SafeFileName%2A>。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog.SafeFileName%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.String> that contains one safe file name for each selected file.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.String>，其中包含每个选定文件的一个安全的文件名称。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is an array with a single item whose value is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是带有其值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>单个项的数组

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that appears in the title bar of a file dialog.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在文件对话框的标题栏中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: If Title is null or <xref:System.String>, a default, localized value is used, such as "Save As" or "Open".
trans-unit.target: 如果标题为 null 或<xref:System.String>，使用默认的本地化值，如"另存为"或"打开"。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is the text that appears in the title bar of a file dialog.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，它是在文件对话框的标题栏中显示的文本。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents a file dialog.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，表示文件对话框。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representation of <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog"></xref> that contains the full pathname for any files selected from either <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog"></xref>, <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>表示形式<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog"> </xref> ，其中包含从选择的任何文件的完整路径名<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog"> </xref>， <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog"> </xref>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog accepts only valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] file names.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示对话框是否接受仅有效[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]文件名称。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if warnings will be shown when an invalid file name is provided; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果将提供无效文件名时; 显示警告否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
